node.title: Queenstown tourism boss to step down
node.description: The head of Destination Queenstown has resigned less than a year after starting.
node.content:
["", "The head of Destination Queenstown has resigned less than a year after starting.", "", "
Paul Abbot relocated from Australia to take up the role of Destination Queenstown chief executive, but Covid-19-related border restrictions meant his family wasn't able to join him as planned. Photo: 123RF
", "couldn't join him from Australia as planned.", "Paul Abbot was appointed chief executive of the district's tourism marketing agency last March and took up the job in July.", "This March, he will be stepping down.", "He relocated from Australia for the role, but border restrictions prevented his family from joining him as planned late last year.", "Destination Queenstown's chairperson, Richard Thomas, said Abbot had made the right call for himself and his family.", "", ""]
